== Books - for members of the group ==
=== O'Reilly ===

O'Reilly is very supportive of local user groups. We should put in a request for some books. Lets get our learn on.

* http://ug.oreilly.com/register.csp

Suggestions-
* The Book of Audacity http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781593272708/ (For audio editing and podcasting)

* bash Pocket Reference http://oreilly.com/catalog/0636920010166/ 

* The Linux Programming Interface http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781593272203/

* Asterisk: The Definitive Guide (v3)

=== Apress ===

* http://www.apress.com/user-group-program

=== Packt ===

* http://www.packtpub.com/user-groups

=== Art of Community by Jono Bacon ===
This is free to download- so have at it;
http://www.artofcommunityonline.org/get/ - it would not hurt if anyone felt like buying it either.
